donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
1) Incentives mechanims and partnership modalities developed and enhanced for public and private investment in waterless and poor communities
2) Financing and programing policies reviewed and amended to rationalize assistance and increase ownership and accountability
3) Tariff-setting methodology adjusted for small scale water service providers
4) Project management committee organized to support programme coordination for MDGF 1919: Enhancing access to and provision of water services with active participation of the poor.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
1) Water and sanitation councils adn water user associations formed with increased participation of women
2) Capacities at the local level strengthened, with particpation of marginalized groups especially women
- mentoring mechanisms institutionalized
- WatSAN toolbox developed
3) improved sector plans formulated and monitoring mechanisms established
4) Localized customer service codes based on the framework for service delivery developed and adopted

project_descr: MDGF 1919 ENhancing Access to and Provision of Water Services with the Active Participation of the Poor
project_title: Enhancing Access to & provision of water services
